mainSequence.step: User triggers the removal of an audio effect by selecting the remove option from the dropdown menu.
The dropdown item handles the removal effect action.
The audio effect panel is closed by the dropdown.
The effect removal action is initiated by the audio effect action.
The effect removal process is managed by the audio effect saga.
The event emitter emits an 'EFFECT_DELETE_EFFECT' event.
The audio controller removes the specified effect.
The audio effect action removes the effect.
